title: Tell me about a food delivery experience.

korean: 지난주에 치킨을 시켰다가 좀 웃긴 일이 있었어요.
금요일 저녁이었는데, 친구 두 명이랑 집에서 영화 보기로 했거든요.
음, 보통 30분 정도면 오는데, 그날은 한 시간이 넘어도 안 오더라고요.
앱으로 확인해보니까 배달원이 다른 주소로 간 거예요.
그래서 전화했더니, 잘못된 주소로 배달했다고 하더라고요.
다시 가져와야 한다고 해서 더 기다렸는데요,
결국 총 2시간 넘게 걸려서 치킨이 왔어요.
근데 당연히 식어 있었고, 눅눅해져 있었죠.
가게에서 미안하다고 음료수랑 떡볶이를 서비스로 보내줬어요.
치킨은 다시 튀겨 먹었는데, 그래도 맛은 괜찮았어요.
웃으면서 먹긴 했는데, 좀 황당하긴 했던 경험이었어요.
english: Last week I ordered chicken and something funny happened.
It was Friday evening, and I decided to watch a movie at home with two friends.
So I ordered 3 chickens through the delivery app.
Um, usually it comes in about 30 minutes, but that day it didn't come even after an hour.
When I checked on the app, the delivery person had gone to a different address.
So when I called, they said they delivered to the wrong address.
They said they had to bring it back, so I waited more,
and eventually it took over 2 hours total for the chicken to arrive.
But of course it was cold and had gotten soggy.
The restaurant apologized and sent drinks and tteokbokki as a service.
We re-fried the chicken, and the taste was still okay.
We ate it laughing, but it was kind of an absurd experience.
